name: Mini Knight Trials
description:
Welcome to the forbidden romance story. The knight is serving for the king in the palace and his duty is to protect the king’s only daughter. After a while, the knight and the princess started to fall for each other, but they had to keep their love as a secret, or the knight would have been killed by the jealous prince charming. Now, the princess has been taken in to a secret room and the knight is willing to do whatever it takes to fight for his love and find the princess; from passing through different obstacles to keep the balance of the bike.

The miniature knight is riding on his powerful motorbike and is driving through the obstacles, ramps, ducks and a lot more difficulties to find the secret door. There are 10 different challenging levels and you've got only 1 objective: Reach to the end without crashing and losing the balance of your bike.

Download Mini Knight Trials for free and enjoy hours of fun with family and friends. You need to control your bike with regards to physics rules and you should totally focus on the game to avoid any crash or losing balance.
So, do you think you've got what it takes to help the knight find the place of the princess and bring a happy ending to the forbidden romance story?

Realistic Physics-Based Controls

The gameplay is as simple as hitting the virtual buttons on the screen to accelerate, brake, lean back and lean forward. It may get a while to completely get familiar with the gameplay, but once you get used to how to control the bike, you just need to get the most out of physics rules to handle and control the motorbike properly. Sometimes you just need to keep pressing the Accelerator button to move forward with highest speed, and sometimes you need to lower the speed in order to avoid losing the balance of your bike. The decision is yours.
As you move further and complete more levels, you get to face more difficult challenges and you need to find a solid strategy to get through such levels.

Wonderful 3D Graphics with Amazing Sound Effects

When it comes to such realistic bike riding simulator games, smooth gameplay design, graphics and sound effects matter the most. Well, Mini Knight Trails comes with high-quality 3D graphics and the sound effects are so real and surrounding, that you’ll feel being in a real motor race.

Mini Knight Trials: Bike Riding Main Features at a Glance:

• Clean and neat design with super user-friendly interface
• Wonderful 3D graphics with high-quality designs and environments
• Realistic music and surrounding sound effects
• Realistic physics-based controls
• Smooth and addictive gameplay
• Different levels, missions, challenges with different difficulty levels
• Fun for everyone
• Free

So, if you are looking for a realistic bike riding simulator game with high quality graphics, 3D environments, surrounding sound effects, smooth gameplay and engaging story, Mini Knight Trails is a perfect choice for you. You just need to take your time and get used to the bike riding control, and get yourself ready for hours of fun. The challenges, difficulties and the obstacles to pass through are just the beginning of the real adventure. You just need to avoid hitting any obstacles or crashing as well as avoid losing the balance and control of your bike, and find your way to the finish line. Each level comes with different challenges and you can never guess what comes next.
Download Mini Knight Trails for free and let us know about any bugs, questions, feature requests or any other suggestions. Your feedback is valuable to us and stay tuned of even more levels, challenges and surprises to come.

The end of the forbidden romance story is at your hand. You can either help the miniature knight to get through all the challenges and difficulties to finally find the secret room and the princess, or you may fail finishing the entire levels and there won’t be any happy ending story.
Just get on the bike, hit the accelerator button and start your adventures journey.
